name: Food Wars! Shokugeki no Soma OVA

quotes.quote: If you want to grow just look above you, there are plenty of people perfect to serve as fodder for your growth.

Everyone wants to think like this: "It can't be helped if I lose against someone with talent". Like that, be it consciously or unconsciously... People put a lid on their hearts. They want to protect their pride, self-esteem... or whatever.
If there's something you want to go through with, you should stick to it without keeping up appearances.

Everyone wants to think like this: ""It can't be helped if I lose against someone with talent"". Like that, be it consciously or unconsciously... People put a lid on their hearts. They want to protect their pride, self-esteem... or whatever.
